columns.Building_ID: The unique identifier for each building.
columns.Region_ID: The identifier linking the building to its region.
columns.Name: The name of the building.
columns.Address: The physical location of the building.
columns.Number_of_Stories: The total number of stories in the building.
columns.Completed_Year: The year the building was finished.

building.table_description: The table tracks building details within specific regions.

columns.Region_ID: The unique identifier for each region.
columns.Name: The name of the region.
columns.Capital: The capital city of the region.
columns.Area: The total land area of the region in square units.
columns.Population: The total number of residents in the region.

region.table_description: The table provides demographic and geographic details of regions.
